{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = DUB-E100-side.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = USB 2.0 Fast Ethernet Adapter |caption2 = |pp = https://www.dlink.com/en/products/dub-e100-high-speed-usb-20-fast-ethernet-adapter |sp = http://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DUB-E100 |dl = |wikidevi = D-Link_DUB-E100_rev_C1 |wikipedia = |brand = D-Link |model = DUB-E100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = C1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/09/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DUB-E100_rev_C1 |sernum = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded dongle |vendor_id = 2001 |device_id = 1a02 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |ethoui = BC:F6:85, C4:A8:1D, C8:BE:19, |chip1 = ASIX;AX88772B; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = asix |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 08/2012 |price = |upc = 790069243943 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00006B7D8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://grokbase.com/t/centos/centos/13axyyat31/c6-4-d-link-usb-network-device-2001-1a02-not-work ''D-Link DUB-E100 rev C1'' on '''GrokBase'''] ==Notes== {{SCollapse|lsusb / patch |
lsusb

Bus 003 Device 001: ID 2001:1a02 D-Link Corp. 
DUB-E100 Fast Ethernet Adapter(rev.C1) [ASIX AX88772]

usb 3-1: New USB device found, idVendor=2001, idProduct=1a02
usb 3-1: Product: DUB-E100C
usb 3-1: Manufacturer: D-Link          
usb 3-1: SerialNumber: D7107E
eth1: register 'asix' at usb-ehci-platform-1, 
 ASIX AX88772B USB 2.0 Ethernet, bc:f6:85:d7:10:7e

T:  Bus=01 Lev=01 Prnt=01 Port=01 Cnt=01 Dev#=  2 Spd=480 MxCh= 0
D:  Ver= 2.00 Cls=ff(vend.) Sub=ff Prot=00 MxPS=64 #Cfgs=  1
P:  Vendor=2001 ProdID=1a02 Rev= 0.01
S:  Manufacturer=D-Link          
S:  Product=DUB-E100C
S:  SerialNumber=D7107E
C:* #Ifs= 1 Cfg#= 1 Atr=a0 MxPwr=200mA
I:* If#= 0 Alt= 0 #EPs= 3 Cls=ff(vend.) Sub=ff Prot=00 Driver=asix
E:  Ad=81(I) Atr=03(Int.) MxPS=   8 Ivl=128ms
E:  Ad=82(I) Atr=02(Bulk) MxPS= 512 Ivl=0ms
E:  Ad=03(O) Atr=02(Bulk) MxPS= 512 Ivl=0ms

patch

DUB-E100 Fast Ethernet Adapter(rev.A) [ASIX AX88172]
// DLink DUB-E100A
USB_DEVICE (0x2001, 0x1a00),
.driver_info = (unsigned long) &dlink_dub_e100_info,

DUB-E100 Fast Ethernet Adapter(rev.C1) [ASIX AX88772]
// DLink DUB-E100C
USB_DEVICE (0x2001, 0x1a02),
+.driver_info = (unsigned long) &ax88772b_info,

DUB-E100 Fast Ethernet Adapter(rev.B1) [ASIX AX88772]
// DLink DUB-E100B
USB_DEVICE (0x2001, 0x3c05),
.driver_info = (unsigned long) &dlink_dub_e100b_info
}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
